headline: Gubernatorial Candidate Shapiro Holding Petition Events in Valley
author: WKOK Staff
sentences: SUNBURY – State Attorney General Josh Shapiro will be in parts of the Valley Saturday for four petition signings, as he continues his bid for the Governor’s race on the Democratic ticket.
Shapiro will make appearances in Lewisburg around 12:30 p.m., followed by stops in Sunbury and Selinsgrove.
State Representative Austin Davis, Shapiro’s running mate, will also in attendance at all events.
